entity.name: Gavin Newsom
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text:
Workers in the food sector are the unsung heroes of this unprecedented time.

I signed an Executive Order that will increase sanitary measures and give 2 weeks of supplemental paid sick leave for #COVID19.

Our grocery lines have become our frontlines and must be treated as such.
